text: calm and quite area, fresh air and greenery. Good place to relax. Suitable for family, friends and solo traveller's.
Great place to soak the sun, play frisbee or ball games, great for kids to run around. Windy too!
Great place for family and kids to spend time together!

Great place for kids to run around and ride bikes. Cafe Melba here serves top notch western style food and even have a kids menu, but is slightly pricey. 4 stars instead of 5 only because there isn't much more variety for food besides Cafe Melba.
This place is good to just sit back and relax
